title: Best of The Herd: 11/13/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/13/2019
description:
Colin explains why Baker Mayfield is just a guy especially when you consider how talented some of the QBs coming into the NFL are. He says the Playoff Committee is sending a clear message about one conference in college football. He talks with FS1's Nick Wright about why even after 17 years nobody has been able to stop LeBron. Plus, Colin updates his Super Bowl bubble and it has one AFC favorite on the outside looking in.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
